meanings.definition: A journey or voyage undertaken for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The school organized an expedition to the museum to learn about history.
meanings.sent2: The explorers set out on an expedition to discover new lands.
meanings.sent3: The expedition to find the missing sock in the laundry room turned into a grand adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her expedition into the world of baking led to delicious discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The expedition through the dense forest was filled with excitement and wonder.

meanings.definition: An organized group of people traveling for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The scientific expedition to study marine life was a success.
meanings.sent2: The expedition of volunteers helped rebuild the community after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The expedition of penguins to the ice cream shop was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Their expedition of friendship sailed smoothly through the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The expedition of students to the science fair was filled with anticipation.
